data.text: @GhadahAlghunaim Hello! Our sincere apologies for the inconveniences caused by this delay. Please know that your DM has been answered with further steps to recieve a compensation. All the best! ✈
@bennethie Hello! Yes, we may create a new booking with all passengers together. We invite you to provide your booking number via DM so we may properly assist you. Have a nice day! ✈

@Operatraveller Hello! Our apologies for not being able to get back to you on time for your flight. Nevertheless, we remain available for any inconveniences this may have caused or any further queries. Have a nice day! ✈

@mauro_ai Hello!  Our apologies for not being able to get back to you on time for your flight. Nevertheless, we remain available for any inconveniences this may have caused or any further queries. Have a nice day! ✈
@aleximj Hello! We invite you to provide your email address and last booking number via DM so we may check why was this subscription charged and refund it. Thank you in advance and have a nice day! ✈

@Iama_dreamer4 Hello! Our sincere apologies for this delay and the inconveniences it may have caused. We invite yoiu to submit your claim through the following link so we may properly compensate you: https://t.co/kwc6Hsx4Bl Have a nice day! ✈

data.text: @ctlee1991 Hello! Our apologies about this. We invite you to provide your email address and booking number via DM so we may check your luggage's locations and claim status? Thank you in advance and have a nice day!

@MaxRosenzweig Hello! Our apologies for any inconveniences caused during your check in process. Please know that further steps to reufnd this amount have been sent to your DM. We remain available for any further queries, have a nice day! ✈

@RebekahDaunt Hello!  Our apologies for not being able to get back to you on time for your flight. Nevertheless, we remain available for any inconveniences this may have caused or any further queries. Have a nice day! ✈

@AndreaDenaro Hello! We are still recieving cancellations form Italy. Could you please provide your booking number via DM so we may check if your flight has been affected so far? Thank you in advance! ✈

@mozaffari_a75 Hello! Im this case, you may write your claim through our contact form (https://t.co/L3ocQzbJjY), attaching a screenshot of the error, so we may redirect it to the proper team. Have a nice day! ✈

data.text: @Arthur_Piraux Bonjour Arthur 😊 Afin de mieux vous aider, pourriez-vous nous indiquer le numéro de votre réservation en DM?
@dudu_sen ¡Hola Eduardo! Te invitamos a facilitar tu número de reserva por DM para verificar el estado de check in. ¡Gracias de antemano! ✈

@jpc_1958 ¡Gracias! Esta reserva ha sido reembolsada por completo y la reclamación está asignada a un agente quien debe enviar respuesta durante esta próxima semana. Quedamos atentos a cualquier otra consulta, ¡un saludo!
@jpc_1958 Mis disculpas pero no nos es posible abrir archivos desde este chat, ¿Puedes por favor escribir el número de reserva por DM?
@jpc_1958 ¡Hola! Te pedimos por favor que facilites tu número de reserva y correo electrónico por DM para localizar esta reclamación. ¡Gracias de antemano! ✈
@mmisery Muchas gracias por tu reseña! Te esperamos para seguir volando con nosotros!
@mozaffari_a75 Hello Amir. We inform you that if the flight has already passed, we do not have access to your boarding pass, and therefore, we cannot send it to you. We are sorry. Best regards

@DoeAdrien Bonjour 😊 Le prix du billet vari en fonction du tarif sélectionné, la date de l'achat et le taux d'occupation de l'avion. Ainsi, plus la date du vol s'approche et qu'il reste peu de siège dans l'avion, plus le tarif augmente. De la même manière, si le nombre de sièges li...

data.text: @Glaucium_ Buenas tardes Elena 😊 Nos gustaría saber más sobre ello. ¿Nos podría aportar más detalles sobre estos sorteos por MD?

urls.title: VOLOTEA | Tarifas y precios de Servicios para tu vuelo: asientos, equipaje, mascotas, seguros
urls.description: Web oficial Volotea, la aerolínea de corto y medio radio que opera en el Sur de Europa: precios, equipajes, asientos, mascotas, niños, seguros. Consulta el listado de las tarifas de los servicios que podrás contratar para tu vuelos y viaje.
